skills.title: Python (Flask & Django)
skills.description: I possess practical experience with Flask, a flexible and lightweight python web framework. My journey extends beyond Flask as i am actively exploring and advancing my skills with Django a robust full-stack web framework.

skills.title: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, ReactJS & React Native
skills.description: I have a solid grasp of HTML, CSS and Bootstrap, combined with my foundational understanding of React and React Native.

skills.title: MySQL
skills.description: I have an understanding of database management using MySQL and i am well versed in Structured Query Language(SQL).

skills.title: Version Control System
skills.description: I possess a strong command of Git, a leading version control system crucial for collaborative and efficient software development.

skills.title: FastAPI
skills.description: I have practical experience building high-performance APIs with FastAPI, a modern Python framework. I’ve leveraged its speed and asynchronous capabilities to deploy machine learning models, such as in my project *PotatoDoc*, enhancing real-time agricultural solutions.

skills.title: TensorFlow
skills.description: I have solid experience with TensorFlow, a leading machine learning framework in Python. In my project *PotatoDoc*, I built a CNN-based deep learning model with 98% accuracy for agricultural disease detection, sharpening my skills in convolutional networks and model deployment.

skills.title: Pandas
skills.description: I have strong experience with Pandas, a powerful Python library for data analysis. In my project *RentEstimator Nairobi*, I used Pandas to preprocess and analyze real estate datasets, enabling a machine learning model with 91% accuracy, refining my skills in data manipulation and exploration.

skills.title: Jupyter Notebook
skills.description: I am proficient in Jupyter Notebook, an interactive Python environment for data science.I used it to develop and test models for *PotatoDoc* and *RentEstimator Nairobi*, streamlining my workflow for data visualization and machine learning experimentation.

skills.title: Scikit-learn
skills.description: I have robust experience with Scikit-learn, a versatile Python library for machine learning. In my project *RentEstimator Nairobi*, I utilized Scikit-learn’s Decision Tree Regression to build a model with 91% accuracy, enhancing my skills in predictive modeling and data analysis.

skills.title: Docker
skills.description: I have practical experience with Docker, containerizing applications for efficient deployment. In my project *Potato Doc*, I used Docker to package and serve a TensorFlow model with TF Serving, ensuring scalability and consistency across environments.

portfolio.title: Potato Doc
portfolio.description: Developed an AI app to detect potato diseases (98% accuracy) using TensorFlow for data preprocessing and CNN model building. Optimized with quantization, served via TF Serving and Docker with MySQL (SQLAlchemy) backend, and deployed on GCP with a React Native/React.js(for the web app) front-end.

portfolio.title: RentEstimator Nairobi
portfolio.description: Developed a machine learning web app with Flask, React.js, and MySQL, using Pandas and Scikit-learn’s Decision Tree Regression (91% accuracy) to predict Nairobi rental prices.

portfolio.title: Job Web app(Mark Careers)
portfolio.description: Developed and launched a dynamic, database-driven jobs website using Flask, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, seamlessly connected to a MySQL database.

portfolio.title: Github Finder App
portfolio.description: An app that allows fetching of github user profiles through AJAX requests.

portfolio.title: Snake game
portfolio.description: I created a classic Snake Game using Python and Pygame, a popular game development library. The game features a snake that grows longer as it consumes apples, while avoiding collisions with itself.
